item.title: Reliance Industries seen as biggest winner from China’s overcapacity cuts, says Morgan Stanley; raises target price

review.headline_rewrite: Reliance Industries seen as biggest winner from China’s overcapacity cuts, says Morgan Stanley; raises target price
bullets: Morgan Stanley retained its overweight rating on Reliance and raised its 12-month price target to ₹1,701 from ₹1,602, signalling a potential upside of 24.4
In addition, Ambani confirmed plans to list Jio through an initial public offering (IPO) in the first half of 2026.

item.title: India to pilot battery storage at coal plants to balance grid as solar power surges

bullets: India will test the installation of battery storage systems at some coal power plants, as the country grapples with integrating massive solar capacity while
Recently, NTPC floated a tender for setting up of 1.7 GW of battery storage across 11 coal plants.
